Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
I wanna talk with a human
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.
I understand you're looking for assistance. Please let me know your question, and I'll do my best to help you right away.
I would like to know the reason for the rejection of the campaign: 1945619272841207809

Ad rejection reasons are unique to each ad. You should have received an email from Ad Support with the subject line ‘Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required’ detailing the specific reason for the rejection. Please review that email carefully and focus on addressing the highlighted issue. If you believe your ad complies with the policies or if the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.
